title: BQ Flea Market
description: A flea market featuring local vendors and unique finds, held under the BQE.
address: Under the BQE along Meeker Ave between Union Ave and Lorimer St. (Williamsburg/Greenpoint)

title: NYC Vintage Bazaar at Grand Bazaar NYC
description: A vintage market featuring unique finds and local vendors, held indoors and outdoors.

title: Saint Francis Day Fair and Pet Blessings
description: A fair celebrating Saint Francis with pet blessings and community activities.
address: The Cathedral of Saint John the Divine (Morningside Heights)

title: 87th Annual Pulaski Day Parade
description: A parade celebrating Polish heritage, taking place on Fifth Avenue from 39th to 54th streets.

title: Harlem Meet Africa Festival
description: A festival celebrating African culture with music, food, and community activities.
address: Richard Rodgers Amphitheater in Marcus Garvey Park (East Harlem)

title: Nigeria Independence Day Parade
description: A parade celebrating Nigeria's independence, taking place on Madison Ave from 38th to 24th streets.

title: Muddy Paws Rescue Block Party
description: A block party to support Muddy Paws Rescue, featuring fun activities and community engagement.

title: Old Stone House Artisans Bazaar
description: An artisan market featuring local crafts and goods, set in Washington Park.

title: Korean Parade + Festival
description: A vibrant parade followed by a festival celebrating Korean culture, with food, music, and activities.
address: Parade: Sixth Ave from 38th to 27th St; Festival: Koreatown, 32nd St bet Broadway + Fifth Ave

title: East 6th Street Community Activation
description: A community event in front of the Ukrainian Museum, featuring local artists and activities.
address: In front of the Ukrainian Museum (East Village)

title: NYC Halal Fest
description: A food festival celebrating halal cuisine, with various vendors and activities.

title: Jersey City Night Market
description: A night market featuring local vendors, food, and entertainment.

title: Bronx Night Market
description: A vibrant night market featuring food, music, and local vendors, marking the last of the season.

title: Maker Faire Coney Island
description: A family-friendly event showcasing makers, artists, and innovators, with hands-on activities.

title: 41st Annual Queens Agricultural Fair
description: A fair celebrating agriculture with exhibits, food, and activities for all ages.

title: Annual Brooklyn Synth + Pedal Expo
description: An expo for music enthusiasts featuring synthesizers and pedals, with performances and workshops.

title: Red Hook Open Studios
description: An event showcasing local artists and their work in Red Hook, Brooklyn.

title: 35th Annual Jersey City Art + Studio Tour
description: A cultural event showcasing local artists and studios in Jersey City.
